Description: Both the Azure Web Application Service and the Corporate Intranet Application share similar threats such as DDoS attacks and SQL injection vulnerabilities.
Mitigation strategies for SQL injection and unauthorized access are shared across multiple applications within the organization.
Common attack patterns such as credential theft and session hijacking are prevalent across multiple applications.

Source: A noticeable increase in DDoS attacks targeting web applications across the industry.
Persistent vulnerabilities related to SQL injection across various applications.
